location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Lieutenant-Colonel C J Doyle, President of the Board of Superintendence for Improving the Breed of Cattle, Fort William

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informs Doyle that he has shipped a desert Arab stallion, which was purchased by Major General Sir William Grant Keir and consigned to Doyle.
